attributes.action: Give workers at Matalan retail stores better working conditions or better pay.
attributes.background: Matalan has a tendancy to treat staff badly. Often giving shockingly short notice of working hours, being rude and unsupportive towards staff. This is all as well as being paid £4 per hour for people under 18 and £5.20 for under 21s. Although this may be minimum wage, it is not enough to live from.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Matalan, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to take action. For example, you could ask for the minimum wage to be increased.
